steps.title: They are found in various caves.
steps.content: They are found in various caves. They are easy to catch.

steps.title: This increases Woobat's happiness.
steps.content: This increases Woobat's happiness. Happiness will be a key tool in evolving it into Swoobat.

steps.title: This is another way to increase its happiness.
steps.content: This is another way to increase its happiness.

steps.title: Rare Candies are an easier way.
steps.content: Rare Candies are an easier way. However, be careful as these decrease gained EVs in stats.

steps.title: If you have the Bicycle, put Woobat in your party and ride around for a while.
steps.content: If you have the Bicycle, put Woobat in your party and ride around for a while.

steps.title: Keep repeating these methods!
steps.content: Keep repeating these methods! Eventually, you will have a Swoobat.

steps.title: Have fun battling with your newly-evolved Swoobat!
steps.content: Have fun battling with your newly-evolved Swoobat!
